channel.title: Help
channel.description:
Ok So Im Following Rics Tut on Webclient And Ive Did This Step But.. I Know We Aint A Spoon Feeding Community But Can Someone Just Say If I Should Or Not 2.3 - Step 3 - Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java(Sprites) Now for the sprite part. Which most people don't do right. I don't know why. =\ Open up Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and replace all:
./Sprites/
with this
C:/.yourclientname_file_store_32/Sprites/
But In My Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java I Have Other Stuff Called Spirts Not Spirtes Do I Still Do The Same Process For Them As I Did For The Spirtes One? E.g: In my Class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java I Have This
anInt1440 = 12; anInt1441 = 11; Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Files/Spirts/headhint1.png"); anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441]; PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440); pixelgrabber.grabPixels();
But As You See It Says Spirts Not Spirtes.. But Should I Do What I Did For Spirtes To The Spirts One?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“JuniorCautionz, post:3, topic:393517”][quote author=Pzezima2 link=topic=490685.msg3587852#msg3587852 date=1304335406]
Don’t triple post.
[/quote]

How Did I Triple Post? Theres Only 2 Posts Thats Nearly Same[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @JuniorCautionz JuniorCautionz
item.description:
@JuniorCautionz wrote:

Ok So Im Following Rics Tut on Webclient And
Ive Did This Step But… I Know We Aint A Spoon Feeding Community But Can Someone Just Say If I Should Or Not

2.3 - Step 3 - Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java(Sprites)
Now for the sprite part. Which most people don’t do right. I don’t know why. =
Open up Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and replace all:

./Sprites/

with this

C:/.yourclientname_file_store_32/Sprites/

But In My Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java
I Have Other Stuff Called Spirts Not Spirtes Do I Still Do The Same Process For Them As I Did For The Spirtes One?

E.g: In my Class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java I Have This

anInt1440 = 12; anInt1441 = 11; Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Files/Spirts/headhint1.png"); anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441]; PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440); pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

But As You See It Says Spirts Not Spirtes… But Should I Do What I Did For Spirtes To The Spirts One?

Read full topic
